slots.label: Path
slots.description: Employ Passion to enter the Wood - or, with the right lore, find the way to the White Door, the door where the dead throng.

slots.label: Persistence
slots.description: With more Passion, I could wander the Wood repeatedly.

slots.label: Ascent
slots.description: Invest Health to pass the White Door - or follow desire to the Stag Door, the door of the Know.

slots.label: Fortitude
slots.description: With more Health, I could traverse the White Door repeatedly.

slots.label: Ascent
slots.description: Invest Reason to pass the Stag Door - or, with the right lore, find the way to the Spider's Door, the door where blood is spilled.

slots.label: Intellect
slots.description: With more Reason, I could wander the area beyond the Stag Door repeatedly.

slots.label: Ascent
slots.description: The Peacock Door does not open, exactly.

slots.label: Lore
slots.description: With some Knock-lore, and a tool that will not shatter, I could enter the Peacock Door as many times as I'd like
